price: Yang demikian itu adalah karena Allah telah menurunkan Alkitab dengan membawa kebenaran; dan sesungguhnya orang-orang yang berselisih tentang (kebenaran) Alkitab itu, benar-benar dalam penyimpangan yang jauh.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخۡتَلَفُواْ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَفِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha nazzala al-kitāba bil-ḥaqi wa-inna alladhīna ikh'talafū fī al-kitābi lafī shiqāqin baʿīdin
